import React from 'react'; const WelcomeScreen = ({ onStart, language, t }) => { return (

{t('title')}

{t('tagline')}

{t('welcomeDescription')}

What you'll explore:

  • • Cognitive Flexibility & Metacognition
  • • Working Memory & Organization
  • • Emotional Regulation & Impulse Control
  • • Task Initiation & Sustained Attention
  • • Time Management Skills

The assessment consists of 54 carefully crafted questions across 6 pages. Each question asks you to rate how well statements describe you using an intuitive visual scale.

⏱ Takes approximately 10-15 minutes to complete

); }; export default WelcomeScreen;
